welcomeMessageBody: Please log in or register to start exploring real-time property valuations, market trend analysis, and more powerful features.
mapSearchTooltip: Click to open the map. You can drag the marker on the map to select a location for valuation.
addressSearchPlaceholder: e.g., No. 1, Sec. 4, Xinyi Rd, Da’an Dist., Taipei City
premiumFeatureTooltip: This feature is exclusive to Paid Members and Administrators.
customInputNote: If you fill this section, the AI will prioritize your provided values for estimation. If left blank, it will estimate based on nearby market prices.
valuating_live_data: Connecting to [Taiwan's Ministry of the Interior Real Estate Transaction Database] to query latest sales info...

valuating_rentalYieldAnalysis: Scanning nearby rental websites (591, Zuyou Wang) to collect rental prices...
valuating_bankAppraisalModel: Simulating internal bank risk assessment and collateral value models...

mapView_addressQueryFailed: Failed to query address for this location
mapView_clickToLoad: Click map marker to load this property
manualIntroBody: This manual will guide you through all the powerful features of the AI Property Appraiser. From basic queries to advanced analysis, master property valuation with ease.
manualDisclaimer: [Important Notice] This application is primarily designed and developed for the Taiwan region. All data, valuations, and currency values (New Taiwan Dollar - TWD) are based on the Taiwanese market. For users in other countries, the valuation results are for reference only. Please perform your own currency conversions and consider local market differences.
manualLoginBody: All features require logging in. If you don't have an account, you can easily register as a General or Paid member.
manualApiKeyBody1: The core AI features of this application (like valuation, scenario analysis) are powered by the Google Gemini API. To use these features, you must provide your own API Key.
manualApiKeyBody2: Please click the 'Settings' icon in the top right corner and enter your Gemini API Key under 'API Key Settings'.
manualApiKeyBody3: Your key will only be stored locally in your browser. We will never upload or log it, ensuring your key's security.
manualValuationBody1: On the main screen, enter an address or use the 'Use Current Location' button, select a 'Valuation Basis', and then you can start the valuation. The different bases are for:
manualBasisDesc1: A comprehensive assessment using broad market data, trends, and property conditions, suitable for most situations.
manualBasisDesc2: Primarily analyzes nearby transaction records from official government data, providing objective insights.
manualBasisDesc3: Simulates the perspective and sales strategy of local real estate agencies (e.g., Sinyi, Yungching Realty) for unique market insights.
manualBasisDesc4: Allows you to input known actual size, reference unit price, and floor for a more precise, customized estimate.
manualBasisDesc5: Considers future public infrastructure, urban planning changes, and regional economic growth potential to assess the property's long-term appreciation.
manualBasisDesc6: In addition to a standard valuation, this searches for and discloses nearby (e.g., within 500m) court-announced foreclosure information and analyzes its potential impact on the target property's value for investment reference.
manualBasisDesc7: From an investment standpoint, this simulates a search of nearby rental websites (e.g., 591, Zuyou Wang) for rental prices, lists rental references in the report, and estimates the potential return and value of the property as a rental.
manualBasisDesc8: Simulates a bank's internal appraisal model for mortgage evaluation, considering market liquidity, risk, and collateral value.
manualMapSearchBody: Click the 'Map Search' button to enter the interactive map. You can drag the main marker to any location you are interested in. The system will automatically fetch the new address and update information, allowing you to explore property values in different areas instantly.
manualReportFeatureBody: In the top right of the generated 'AI Comprehensive Analysis Report' and 'AI Scenario Analysis' sections, you can use the 'Print' and 'Export Document' buttons to easily save or share the analysis results.
manualScenarioAnalysisBody: Below the valuation report, paid members can ask hypothetical questions, such as 'How would a new MRT station nearby affect the price?', and the AI will provide professional analysis.
manualComparisonBody: In the 'Nearby Prices' or 'Recent Searches' lists, click the 'Add to Compare' icon on a property card to add it to the comparison list. When you have 2-4 properties, click the 'Compare' button at the bottom to view a detailed side-by-side report.
manualUserRolesBody: The system offers three different user roles:
manualRoleAdminDesc: Has full access, including user management and setting a global API Key.
manualRolePaidDesc: Can use all advanced features, such as the 'Transactions', 'Realtor's View' valuation bases, and 'AI Scenario Analysis'.
manualRoleGeneralDesc: Can use the basic 'Market Factors' valuation feature and other core functionalities.
unlockAdvancedFeatures: Want to unlock more advanced valuation features?
upgradeDescription: Unlock all advanced valuation features, including transaction analysis, realtor perspectives, scenario analysis, and more powerful tools. Click the button below to upgrade securely via PayPal.
upgradeSuccess: Upgrade successful! You are now a Paid Member.
dataManagementHint: Due to network security restrictions, the system cannot directly connect to government servers. To ensure data is up-to-date, you can manually download the transaction CSV file from the MOI Real Estate website and import it here. Imported data will be stored in your browser for future searches.
importFailed: Import failed. Please check the file format.
importFailedNoData: Import failed: No valid data found in file.
dataCleared: All imported data has been cleared.
confirmClearData: Are you sure you want to clear all manually imported data?
csvFormatNote: * Supported format: 'Sale' CSV files downloaded from the MOI Real Estate website (Big5 or UTF-8 encoding).
moiLink: Go to MOI Website to Download
registrationSuccessPrompt: Your account has been successfully created. Please login with your new account.
paymentDisclaimer: By clicking confirm, the system will simulate the payment process and upgrade your account permissions.
